body_html:
@Sergio0694

Looking to your logs, we can see that you have a some syntax errors in your test.cu.cc file, like described by this line:

tensorflow/core/user_ops/test.cu.cc(5): error C2144: errore di sintassi: 'void' deve essere preceduto da ';'

and semantic errors:

tensorflow/core/user_ops/test.cu.cc(14): error C2065: 'blockDim': identificatore non dichiarato

That sounds weird since you're having no errors when building with Linux, as you said.
Do you have some idea why these errors are Windows-specific?

body:
@Sergio0694 

Looking to your logs, we can see that you have a some syntax errors in your test.cu.cc file, like described by this line:
```
tensorflow/core/user_ops/test.cu.cc(5): error C2144: errore di sintassi: 'void' deve essere preceduto da ';'
```
and semantic errors:
```
tensorflow/core/user_ops/test.cu.cc(14): error C2065: 'blockDim': identificatore non dichiarato
```
That sounds weird since you're having no errors when building with Linux, as you said. 
Do you have some idea why these errors are Windows-specific?
